page.title: 08THE ALTRINCHAM FESTIVAL
page.content: THE ALTRINCHAM FESTIVAL WAS STARTED IN 1977. IT HAS ALWAYS HAD A LARGE {PROCESSION. ANY MONEY WHICH IS RAISED GOES TO { {CHARITY.}ORGANISATIONS CAN WRITE IN OR PHONE IN TO BE CONSIDERED FOR THE MONEY. THE DECISION AS TO WHO GETS THE MONEY IS MADE BY THE{FESTIVAL {COMMITTEE.}THERE ARE 26 MEMBERS OF THE COMMITTEE INCLUDING 2 HONORARY MEMBERS. BEFORE THE FESTIVAL STARTS THERE ARE MANY MEETINGS; FIRST ONCE A MONTH,THEN ONCE A FORTNIGHT, AND FINALLY, ONCE A WEEK AS THE FESTIVAL DRAWS NEAR.THE LAST MEETING IS ON THE 4TH JULY. THE COMMITTEE AND THE LOCAL COUNCIL DECID E WHICH STREETS SHOULD BE DECORATED. AS PART OF THE FESTIVAL, THERE IS A { {FLOWER SHOW}AND THE{"MISS ALTRINCHAM"} COMPETITION. THE MAYOR USUALLY ATTENDS THESE FUNCTIONS AND OTHER PROMINENT
